title: Ichigo Switch!
sinopse:
I'm Ichigo. I'm attending the high school for learner actresses. I'm actually working on the anime "Wilde Berry" but I suck at playing love scenes. And one day, the popular Chiaki-kun told me "teach me about love!!" and then I understood that Chiaki-kun was actually seeing "wilde berry." Eh...?! So the popular Chiaki-kun is an...Otaku?!!

(Source: Chibi Manga Scanlations)

Included one-shots: Hoshigarimasen Hito no Mono, Christmas Shimasho♡
